entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 14. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
